mapper.insert: insert into point_purchase(point_purchase_no, member_id, item_no, point_purchase_price, point_purchase_date, point_purchase_payment, point_purchase_status, tid) values(#{pointPurchaseNo}, #{memberId}, #{itemNo}, #{pointPurchasePrice}, #{pointPurchaseDate},#{pointPurchasePayment},#{pointPurchaseStatus}, #{tid})
mapper.select: select p.*, i.item_name from point_purchase p inner join item i on p.item_no=i.item_no where member_id=#{memberId} order by p.point_purchase_date desc
mapper.update: update point_purchase set point_purchase_status='취소' where point_purchase_no=#{pointPurchaseNo}
